# nextAvailableInputBus

**Instance Property**

An unused input bus.

## Declaration

```swift
var nextAvailableInputBus: AVAudioNodeBus { get }
```

## Discussion

This method finds and returns the first input bus that doesn’t have a connection with a node.
title: nextAvailableInputBus
